/AddressAliasHelper.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6ecb83b4ec80fbe49c22f4f95d90482de64660ef5d422a19f4d4b04df31c1237","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://1d0885be6e473962f9a0622176a22300165ac0cc1a1d7f2e22b11c3d656ace88","dweb:/ipfs/QmPRa3KmRpXW5P9ykveKRDgYN5zYo4cYLAYSnoqHX3KnXR"]}},"version":1}

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userdoc.notice: This contract extends the OpenZeppelin `Ownable` contract for L2 contracts to be owned         by contracts on L1. Note that this contract is only safe to be used if the         CrossDomainMessenger system is bypassed and the caller on L1 is calling the         OptimismPortal directly.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "CrossDomainOwnable: caller is not the owner"

arguments.value: CrossDomainOwnable: caller is not the owner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "CrossDomainOwnable: caller is not the owner"

documentation.text:
@notice Overrides the implementation of the `onlyOwner` modifier to check that the unaliased
         `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.
